version_description:
- Now, after you defeat a wild monster, information about your trophies for the victory is recorded in the journal.
- The problem with absent opponent in an Arena has been fixed.
- We have added a confirmation window before giving up a battle. Now, you don’t have to worry that you will tap on the button accidentally and spoil the game.
- The lure cannot be put in the Rift of Arcana anymore., so that you don’t lose it for nothing when the rift disappears.
- The number of Arenas, Obelisks and Libraries worldwide has been increased.
- When you reach level 5, you get to the Bronze League, level 15 – the Silver League, and level 27 – the Golden League. You fight only against players from your league in Arenas and Libraries.
- A lot of fixed bugs and some improvements.
Minor corrections

- New creatures in Bestiary.
- Fixed some rare bugs.
- Improved descriptions of items and texts of messages.

- New special creature Kitsun
- Minor corrections
For more details, visit draconiusgo.com

- The bug with creatures shown as illuminating clouds has been fixed
- The bug with the game glitching before you start catching a creature has been fixed
- Some bugs fixed

- A Silver and Golden League player can place two creatures in an Arena.
- The treasure map will no longer be only with a forest or water.
- A treasure will be hidden in the same place for players from the Silver and Golden League, if they took the first fragment of the map from the same Obelisk at approximtaely the same time.
- Higher level players will only be attacked by rare and powerful wild monsters.
- There will be more chests in the Rift of Arcana, they will stay there until the Rift disappears.
- A lot of other improvements.

- The EULA has been updated.
- The level of opponents in the Duel is reduced (except for the Golden League).
- The ability to distinguish creatures with ideal stats from others (5/5) is added.
- Scrolling through Arenas' defenders is improved.
- The bug of the enemy freezing in battle with 0 HP is fixed.
- The bug of being counted as defeated by a wild monster in case of a victory is fixed.
- Models and animations of some creatures are fixed.
- Some inaccuracies in the texts are fixed.

- 26 new creatures with a Christmas mood!
- 10 new artifacts in the Shop and a new set-bonus!
- A chance to get the soulstone of a defeated creature in the Duel of Wizards.
- Exchange of artifacts for essence.
- New bonus from chests.
- And much more. For more details, visit draconiusgo.com

- Improved game performance.
- A Champion sometimes raises the captured Arena to level 3.
- Caramel and marshmallows are no longer among the rewards for quests.
- Your creatures are marked on a bar of creatures on the screen of an Arena.
- A warning about scheduled maintenance works has been added.
- Fixed some errors displaying terrain on the map.
- Improved texts for some messages.
Minor corrections

- Additional Duels no longer have a time limit.
- We’ve added a possibility to resurrect a creature on its screen.
- We’ve added a creature/chest appearance vibration with open windows in the game.
- In the Arena window, we’ve added the display of charges and the timer of an artifact of remote placing.
- We’ve added a counter of all captured Arenas.
- We’ve improved some interface elements, animations and text messages.
- And much more. For more information, visit draconiusgo.com

- More than 20 new creatures in the mood for love.
- Two new artifacts in the Shop.
- Swiping between the windows of the creatures.
- Notification about the reset of tax collection and other timers within the game.
- Improved descriptions of items and texts of messages.
- And much more. For more details, go to draconiusgo.com

- We've fixed a bug that occurs when deleting creatures.
- We've improved navigation between the creatures' windows.

- The new algorithm of hatching eggs does not allow long-term bad luck.
- Purchase of ready-to-hatch eggs in the Shop.
- Kingpeat can now be found in a Golden Egg.
- The chance of getting a soulstone in a Duel has been increased.
- An entry about a finished Duel of Wizards has been added into the journal.
- And much more. For more details, go to draconiusgo.com
Minor corrections

- We've updated the game map to the current version of OSM.
- We've added game objects on the updated sections of the map.
- We've excluded sweets from the rewards for high-tier quests.
- We've added the Ukrainian version of the game.
- We've fixed some rare errors.
- We've improved some screens and texts of the messages.
- More details - on draconiusgo.com

- We've fixed the problem of authorization via Facebook.

- In the Bestiary, you can see the "golden" creature (if any) in the player's collection.

- We've improved some animations, descriptions of objects and texts of messages.

- Creatures received a new feature – resistance to the element attacks.
- Characters can compare their achievements in the Collector's and Duelist's ratings
- Maximum level of the character and creatures has been increased till the 43rd.
- A few rare errors have been fixed.
- Some animations, descriptions of items and texts of messages have been improved.
- For more details, visit draconiusgo.com/news
